name: Firelight Gilded Horse
text: You can Ritual Summon this card with a "Firelight" card. You can only use each of the following effects of "Firelight Gilded Horse" once per turn. If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 Ritual monster from your Deck to your hand but you cannot Summon monsters with that card's name for the rest of the turn. If this card is destroyed by a card effect: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; send it to the GY.
pendulum_text: During your Main Phase: You can Ritual Summon 1 Level 4 "Firelight" monster from your hand or face-up Extra Deck, then destroy this card. You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Firelight" monsters. This effect cannot be negated.
